task.title: Manage Company Contacts Permissions for Users
task.shortdesc: You can grant the permissions of viewing and managing Company Contacts to extension users.

context.p:
You can grant the following permissions to users:
View Company Contacts.
The authorized users can only view the list and details of Company Contacts.
Manage Company Contacts.
The authorized users can not only view but also manage Company Contacts, such as add, edit, delete, import & export contact entries.
To grant an extension user the permission of viewing and managing Company Contacts, you should proceed as follows:

step.cmd: Log in PBX web interface by your admin account and password.
Go to Contacts (), and click Settings tab.
In the View Company Contacts section, select extension users from Available box to Selected box.

info.p: The selected users can view and quickly contact Company Contacts.

step.cmd: In the Manage Company Contacts section, select extension users from Available box to Selected box.
step.info: When you're busy or out of office, the selected users can help you manage Company Contacts, such as add, edit, delete, import & export contacts.
